name: fast-expo-app
description: âš¡ Fast & modern CLI to create production-ready Expo apps with TypeScript, NativeWind v4, Unistyles v3, MMKV, and more

scripts.build: tsc --project ../../cli/tsconfig.json && bun run copy-template && bun run copy-modules && bun run clean-template
scripts.clean-template: find templates -type d -name 'node_modules' -prune -exec rm -rf {} + && find templates -type d -name '.expo' -prune -exec rm -rf {} + && find templates -type d -name 'Pods' -prune -exec rm -rf {} + && find templates -type d -name 'build' -prune -exec rm -rf {} + && rm -f templates/**/bun.lock templates/**/package-lock.json templates/**/yarn.lock

author: Teczer
